[NSFW language.]

"Bah, these fools will have no idea what hit them!"

[..]

Bein celebrated the otherwise successful job with his loving partner, Anton, ruining the lovely dinner with his complaints about the much-hated inspector. He slept on the couch that night.

Warning: nsfw-ish language.

The news just came in. We've been huddled around the TV for hours. We're all goners. It's official.

Well, that's about my luck. Everyone's cheering, celebrating. I'm still up here on the desk, forgotten again. I hop down, grab my coat, and walk out the door. I plan on walking for a long time.

"Wonderful news everyone, we've released this quarter's earnings and shares rose 40 whole points," I exclaimed.

[..]

"TIM!" I yelled and turned to face him.

Authors note: This has bad language in it. Not sure if this classifies fro NSFW but I'll wait to see what people think. There may be spelling mistakes but I'm kinda tired right now so I might leave it till tomorrow to correct them all. I think it's pretty readable. Also the French joke is not serious just a quip. Please don't be offended.

Plague looked at his watch, ten minutes until the end of the world.

"There's always the next world," he shouted over his shoulder before pushing himself through the portal.

NSfW.
Dear residence of Happy Valley Nursing Home,
We have been advised by our lawyers to take statements from all residents who attended Joe Wilson's 104th birthday party.

Part 1

When I woke up this morning, I stretched and
looked at the writing on my arm like I do every day. It still says, "TOMORROW." That's no surprise. The sense of suspense and foreboding has long passed, since my final tomorrow never does come. I brush my long brown hair out of my eyes, throw on a bra, t-shirt, hoodie, and sweat pants, and pour my cereal.

-NSWF, contains moderate swearing-

"Hawaii gets hit by nuclear dildo missile" No, that won't do, it's not funny enough I thought to myself.

**20 years had passed, giant rubber dildos still stood where they rose, construction companies have tried to remove them, to no avail. Germany is still covered in the pink stuff which turned out to be candy floss causing them all to eat it in attempt to get rid of it but that has lead to become the world unhealthiest nation**

WARNING: some parts NSFW/NSFL

"I have to be more careful," I thought to myself. "He almost died before it was time."

This submission has not been removed.
It was over-or, rather, *he* was over.

Hi u/SorenCelerity, this submission has been removed.

[**Direct prompt replies must be good-faith attempts at new stories or poems**](https://www.reddit.com/r/WritingPrompts/wiki/rules#wiki_rule_1.3A_direct_prompt_replies_must_be_good-faith_attempts_at_new_stories_or_poems)

Hi there, this post has been removed.

[Copy-cat](http://i.imgur.com/38FjDgW.gifv) prompts (taking a recent prompt and changing only a small detail) and recent reposts (even unintentional) are not allowed. Please search the sub before submitting and wait a minimum of two weeks between reposts. If your idea is based on something you read elsewhere on reddit, chances are it's been submitted here already.

**Off-Topic Discussion**: All top-level comments must be a story or poem. Reply here for other comments.

###Reminder for Writers and Readers:
* Prompts are meant to inspire new writing. Responses don't have to fulfill every detail.

"What's the latest back on Earth?" asked Todd. He slouched in an invisible chair, propped up by some force emitted from the vents below
[OT] You might enjoy DC's [Resurrection Man](<URL>)). Similar concept!

There are several problems with your submission. First of all, when we get advertisements for a project, they are [OT] (off topic) posts, and most people have the common courtesy to ask the mods first.

Second. This is too long for a prompt. This is a full fledged idea. We're not here to write specific stories on demand, this is a place for writers to come up with their *own* ideas.
